text: David Ospina Ram√≠rez (born 31 August 1988) is a Colombian football player. He plays as a goalkeeper for Al Nassr and is the captain of the Colombia national team. == References == Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian association football goalkeepers Category:2014 FIFA World Cup players Category:2018 FIFA World Cup players Category:Al Nassr FC players
title: David Ospina
